description: When you're looking for the cooling comfort of linen with the wrinkle resistance of polyester, reach for our cool and comfortable Hempline men's short-sleeve shirt. Created from an eco-conscious hemp/polyester blend with the cozy feel of cotton and the durable quality of hemp, this hemp shirt is breathable, odor-resistant, and soft. We also added a little bit of stretch to the material for ease of movement. Safely store your sunglasses in the front chest pocket in its own handy slot..
name: Royal Robbins Hempline SS - Mens
